long_description: Protect your gear while keeping your crampons close-at-hand with the Black Diamond(R) crampon bag. Designed to hold a single pair of crampons, this bag is constructed from burly coated nylon and puncture-resistant RhinoTek for superb durability. Bag helps minimize snags on your jacket, pack or rope; a tough dual-zippered mesh lid allows for drainage. Semi-rigid rectangular shape fits most crampons styles and can also be used for storage of other sharp hardware like extra picks or ice screws. Bag dimensions: 11 x 5 x 3 inches.
short_description: Protect your gear while keeping your crampons close-at-hand with the Black Diamond(R) crampon bag.
